title: Tannus Tires Looks at Rampage Rider #1 â€“ Krispy Baughman Then and Now
content: Since we’re on a throwback kick these days, or at least it constantly feels like we’re perpetually embracing kooky old-school MTB bits, I thought you’d enjoy this video by Tannus Tires showcasing Krispy Baughman’s evolution of freeride in Utah…
author: prolly
